Title: The Little Girl
Writer: Felischa Marye, Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Kirk A. Moore (executive story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: When Hannah's parents come under scrutiny, Jessica reaches out to Mrs. Baker. Justin struggles to stay clean. Clay reconnects with Skye.
